chunk_text: This may vary based on pick-up location, pace, and the day's events. If you need to be back by a specific time, please let us know in advance. #### What is the duration of the tour? If you choose to add the optional gourmet bites and sweets, you can expect a curated selection of artisanal treats designed by our onsite chef. These may include gourmet mini sandwiches, handcrafted cheeses, charcuterie, fresh fruits, gourmet chocolates, and a variety of other sweet and savory delights.
